simulated_ratings.title: Alone in the Wilderness (2004)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Satisfying, unpretentious portrait of self-reliance and seasons turning.

simulated_ratings.title: Rebecca (1940)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Gothic suspense and brittle romance kept me absorbed.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Witty and effervescent, if a touch slight for me.

simulated_ratings.title: Thing from Another World, The (1951)

simulated_ratings.title: Notorious (1946)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Elegant intrigue and smoldering chemistry hit my sweet spot.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Stark and thoughtful, but its austerity kept me at a distance.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Rousing adventure with creaky charm that still works on me.

simulated_ratings.title: Greed (1924)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Powerful in stretches, but the grim sprawl wears on me.

simulated_ratings.title: Roman Holiday (1953)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Bright, romantic, and bittersweet in the right ways.

simulated_ratings.title: Night of the Hunter, The (1955)

simulated_ratings.title: Big One, The (1997)

simulated_ratings.title: Frankenstein (1931)

simulated_ratings.title: Last Laugh, The (Letzte Mann, Der) (1924)

simulated_ratings.title: Rabbit of Seville (1950)

simulated_ratings.title: Band Wagon, The (1953)

simulated_ratings.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Taut paranoia that still tingles.

simulated_ratings.title: Forbidden Planet (1956)

simulated_ratings.title: Thin Man, The (1934)

simulated_ratings.title: Of Mice and Men (1939)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Warm, storybook world-building that goes down easy despite some stiffness.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Themes of resistance land, though the machinery feels busy.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Moodier character beats and looming dread suited me.

simulated_ratings.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)

simulated_ratings.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004)

simulated_ratings.title: Beauty and the Beast (2017)

simulated_ratings.title: Crash (1996)

simulated_ratings.title: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes! (1978)

simulated_ratings.title: Inland Empire (2006)

simulated_ratings.title: Perks of Being a Wallflower, The (2012)

simulated_ratings.title: Connections (1978)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Serviceable Hong Kong caper beats without much spark.

simulated_ratings.title: Elizabethtown (2005)

simulated_ratings.title: Last Airbender, The (2010)

simulated_ratings.title: Price Above Rubies, A (1998)

simulated_ratings.title: Get on the Bus (1996)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Earnest tearjerker with moments that land and some tidy contrivance.

simulated_ratings.title: Kids (1995)

simulated_ratings.title: Fast, Cheap & Out of Control (1997)

simulated_ratings.title: Inside Out (2015)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Inventive, tender journey that balances gags with genuine feeling.

simulated_ratings.title: Serial Mom (1994)

simulated_ratings.title: August: Osage County (2013)
